title: bAla krSNane
sahitya:
bAla krSnane bArO bEga bArO


anupallavi

  bAla krSNane bArO kAlagaDagavaniDuvenu kOlu buguri ceNDu ninage iTTiruve


caraNam 1    aNNayya balarAma bEDuvanayya aNNayya nI bArelo enna 
sAkumADade OdabEDavo Iga baNNisi tUguve gammana malago
    caraNam 2    yOgigaLa rasane ninage nA jOguLa pADuveno nAga bhUSaNa 
bandu anjisuva ninnanna jOgi haNikhAkuva kaNNu mUcci koLLO
    caraNam 3    bhakta vatsala nenale ninna nA maguvendu kareyale agaNita 
mahimane jagava mOhipa ranga maguvallavO tande purandara viTTalayya
